EmailTemplate.subject: CITGO FLEET SPECIAL OFFER
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Now is the best time to apply for the CITGO Fleet Card! Get 20¢ off per gallon* for 6 months.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Whether your business is large or small, take charge of your fueling expenses with the CITGO fleet card program. For a limited time only, CITGO is offering 20¢ off per gallon* when fueling at your local CITGO station.
The CITGO Fleet card is the perfect way to simplify your vehicle fueling and keep your business on the move...
- Rebates of 20¢ per gallon* for the first 6 months and then continue to save 3¢ per gallon* every time you fuel at your local CITGO Handy Food store.
- Accepted at nearly 6,000 CITGO locations
- Helps prevent unwanted spending with pre-set controls.
- 24/7 U.S. based customer services – for you and your employees
I will be following up with you over the next couple of days. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
I look forward to speaking with you about the needs of your business. Don’t wait any longer to start saving 20¢ per gallon on fuel!
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone} Email: {!User.Email}
*Subject to credit approval. New accounts only. The 6 month promotional period begins on the date your account is opened. Discounts are not applied at the time of purchase – they will appear as an account credit on your monthly billing statement. Must apply by Sept. 30th, 2017. The additional 3 cent rebate is only valid at Handy Food Stores. Ask your sales representative for participating locations. Rebates are subjected to change at any time without prior notice.
